thread.title: After Spicer Scolded Reporters Who Called Executive Order A ‘Ban,’ Jake Tapper Said This
thread.title_full: After Spicer Scolded Reporters Who Called Executive Order A ‘Ban,’ Jake Tapper Said This

author: Kaitlan Collins
title: After Spicer Scolded Reporters Who Called Executive Order A ‘Ban,’ Jake Tapper Said This
text:
TOP 5454948 
Jake Tapper mocked Sean Spicer for using the word ban to describe President Trump’s executive order on immigration after he scolded reporters who referred to it as “a travel ban.” (Photo: CNN screen grab) 
After the White House press secretary said the executive order was not a ban — “it’s to make sure people who are coming in are vetted properly, a ban would mean people can’t get in” — the CNN anchor opened his show Tuesday with footage of the press secretary calling it a ban. 
WATCH: . @jaketapper : Don't follow the media's lead in calling it a ban. Follow the lead of the White House. https://t.co/K2GzrRLRxm pic.twitter.com/DIb2ccsZlV
